content: Intriguing story line. Great puzzles. Appreciated the hint system. Some items were hard to spot. All in all a super fun game.
Very nice

I was really enjoying this game but early in it, an item keeps disappearing from my inventory and I cannot move forward with the game. I Uninstalled and reinstalled and the same item disappeared once I needed it to move forward.
replyContent: Hi Nicole, that definitely shouldn't be happening.. Please email me at support@indgenious.com so I can help you out! :)

content: Spooky and challenging.

Honestly, the only real complaint I have is that some of the items were very hard for me to see. But that could be my fault for having awful eyesight. This game is so cool! Especially for a horror adventure puzzle. Remember is now one of my favorite mobile games I've ever played. I really look forward to your next game/the sequel to Remember! :•D
I got it installed and finished it last night and wow.. I did not see that coming. Really fantastic job on this game. Please tell me that there will be a part 2!
replyContent: Please email me at support@indgenious.com so I can help!

content: After the first attempt with no access I had to and buy the game and it worked love the story but text in computer when loading disks is hard to read test it over saturated can't make out what it says but love the story
replyContent: Woot! Glad you got it working! Can you send me a screenshot of what you're seeing when reading the computer disks? support@indgenious.com. Cheers!

content: Occasional frustrating puzzles aside, I really like the atmosphere and mood of the game. Runs really well and no issues

Intriguing story, well designed puzzles, and having a hint system integrated is really nice. I definitely enjoyed it and hope there's a sequel. My only real complaints are these: -the movement system can get really disorienting, especially in larger areas. Maybe have right angle turns so it's easier to stay oriented? -While the dark and gloomy air is very atmospheric, it sometimes makes the things you need blend in a bit too well.

I was drawn in by this game, the dark atmosphere and storyline were pretty engrossing. The puzzles were hard but I agree with most others who state the hint system really makes a difference. I'm excited for the next installment.
Challenging, but very good! Kinda freaked out everytime a voice speaks out as well as the jump scares.
replyContent: Glad you enjoyed the game!! I'm working on a new ending right now so be sure to join me on social media for updates! :)

content: I loved it.
replyContent: Glad to hear!! Thanks for supporting my game and for the kind review. I'm working on a new ending right now so be sure to join me on social media for updates! :)

content: прекрасная игра, жаль, не нашла игр с похожей атмосферой :'(
replyContent: I spent a lot of time on sound and imagery, trying to get the atmosphere to where I wanted it - sounds like it worked out, glad you enjoyed the experience! If there's any other game devs out there looking to create a captive atmosphere, hit me up and I'll help you out! ;P Thanks for supporting the game! :)

content: Long gameplay and the storyline inside the story are good. Puzzles are on the difficult side, the hint system helps. Last part is a bit frustrating such as having to keep looking inside many cabinets.
replyContent: Thanks for taking the time to review and leave feedback about the game - it helps us indies a lot! It sounds like you enjoyed the game, but I'm curious to know what I could do to earn another star or two from ya. Feedback is always appreciated - support@indgenious.com. :)

content: This game has captivated me from the very beginning, totally worth playing.
replyContent: Thanks very much for your support, I'm glad you enjoyed my game!  I'm working on a new ending right now so please join me on social media to get updates.  Thanks for playing and taking the time to leave a nice review! Cheers! :)

content: Looking forward to more
replyContent: Thanks very much, I'm glad the game has you hooked!  I'm working on a new ending right now, so please join me on social media for updates!  I do this all in my spare time so unfortunately the sequel will take some time.  Cheers and thanks for playing! :)

content: I was stumped by a lot of the puzzles, but I really appreciated the challenge. I like the hint system as well. Sometimes u need a little nudge in the right direction for all the pieces to fall in place. Can't wait for the next installment! I'm hooked!
replyContent: Good to hear! I'm working on a new ending right now, so please join me on social media for updates!  I do this all in my spare time so unfortunately the sequel will take some time.  Cheers and thanks for playing! :)

content: Loved this game! Very excited to hear any news about a second game! Very challenging puzzles, really enjoyed it.
replyContent: Glad you had fun!! I'm working on a new ending right now, so please join me on social media for updates!  I do this all in my spare time so unfortunately the sequel will take some time.  Cheers and thanks for playing! :)

content: Update: developer is very responsive. Had a couple issues. Have been addressed. restarting from beginning seemed to fix it. Good graphics and story, mostly good puzzles and able to skip tedious ones. My only complaint is navigation was very awkward. Still worth the purchase, and waiting for the sequel!
replyContent: Thanks a lot for giving the game another try!! Navigation is definitely the Achilles heel of the game.  If you can think of any specific places that could be improved please email me at support@indgenious.com.  Thanks for playing, glad you had fun! :)

content: Getting my character to move in certain directions could be very frustrating at times. I did enjoy some of the puzzles though.
replyContent: Thanks for playing and for your support!  Navigation is a weak point in the game for sure - if there are any specific areas you think could be improved please email me at support@indgenious.com.  Cheers! :)

content: I am very impressed by the complexity and variety of the puzzles, and the game did have several of those unexpected jump scares that brought out the goosebumps. But what really put it to a whole other level was the music and ambient score, which gave the whole thing a sense of uneasiness and tension more than any puzzle/escape game I've played. Not sure, though, if there are multiple endings, or if messed up somewhere, but I wound up with a cliffhanger "to be continued." Will there be a 2nd?
replyContent: Thank you for such a thoughtful review! Many hours were spent polishing the ambiance and music so I really appreciate your words.  There is only a single ending, but I am working on a new ending to the game - please join me on social media for updates!  I do all of this in my spare time so the sequel is going to be a while. :)

content: I love the game. The idea is great. I'm unhappy, however, that i was charged for an unfinished game. I can't wait for the game to be complete. I only hope i don't have to pay more for it.
replyContent: I promise that while the story may not wrap up nicely, the game is a full game.  But to that end, I've been working on a new ending that I'm hoping will add a little more closure to the story for folks.  Please join me on social media for updates! :)

content: A well-realised, clever, and engaging game. Interesting story, too. Minimal permissions. It does get challenging at times, but the hints system helps. I happily paid to remove ads. It's been a most welcome and surprising distraction. Looking forward to a sequel!
replyContent: Thank you for reaching out over email as well as this fantastic review! These are certainly interesting times and I'm glad the game was able to help you through.  I'm working on a new ending for the game, so please join me on social media for updates.  Thanks for playing and for supporting the game! :)

content: I don't take buying mobile games lightly, but the quality and effort that went into Remember was worth every cent. The writing is amazing and the controls feel natural. Definitely worth paying for!
replyContent: Thanks for your support!!  I'm glad you enjoyed the experience as much as you did!  I'm working on a new ending right now, so please join me on social media if you'd like updates!  Cheers! :)

content: The blocks part of one of the levels is stupid. Dumb touch control make it not fun to do. Also do tell me patience when trying to control the stupid blocks suck to begin with.
replyContent: The blocks puzzle is very divisive - some hate it, others love it. It's also one of the most challenging puzzles in the game. You will be presented with the option to skip the third puzzle after 3 minutes of play. The block puzzle also supports multi-touch, which may help you out. Please email me at support@indgenious.com if you need assistance! :)

content: A good adventure game w/ the makings of a good story. The premise is fresh, but the storytelling relies heavily on text, which leads to a couple problems: one, the environments you're exploring often seem disconnected from what you're reading (beyond the degree to which this is justified in the story); and two, the writing is okay but not really good enough to carry a text-heavy story. Also, it's sad to see another horror game take the "spooky woman with long hair" shortcut.
replyContent: Many thanks for your thoughtful review and for supporting my game! I'm always looking to improve and will try to do better in the future. If you don't mind emailing me at support@indgenious.com I'd love to pick your brain about the game. I'm also working on a new ending in an effort to provide a little more closure to the story. Thanks for playing!

content: Love it, give us more!! Thank you for all of your hard work!
replyContent: Thanks very much!! I'm working on a new ending for the game right now, so be sure to join me on social media for updates. Thanks for playing and supporting my game, I'm glad you liked! :)

content: I was in love with this game until the puzzle with the wooden blocks. It's not hard to solve, but trying to move the blocks into position is a nightmare. The way they move is ridiculous and makes it so easy to knock down what you've just done. Edit: Thanks so much for the quick and helpful response! I was able to get through the 2nd puzzle and skip the 3rd. Bumping this up to 5 stars!
replyContent: Hey Molly, sorry to hear your frustration. The block puzzles are very divisive; some love, others hate. Because of this the third puzzle will offer a skip option after 3 minutes of play. I hope you can keep going!! :)

content: Loved it although I'm a bit of a scaredy cat. Hope there's gonna be a second game.
replyContent: It will still be some time before the second part is released, but I'm actually working on a new ending as we speak. Thank you for playing, I'm glad you enjoyed the game! Please join me on social media to get notified of future releases! :)

content: Sorry - would have paid sooner but T-Mobile was being a b!7(h and then i bought it on my husband's home and it still wanted me to pay on the tablet. But here yah go, I owe ya *throws you a bag of coins and stars*
replyContent: ** Takes bag of coins and stars in side of head.  Waves. ** - Thanks!! :)

content: Awesome game! I had an issue and the dev responded immediately. Can't wait for more games from this dev ❤
replyContent: Please email me at support@indgenious.com so I can help!

content: Paid for something that I thought might be slightly different. Not compelling or interesting at all.
replyContent: Sorry you didn't enjoy the game! If there is any specific feedback you think could improve the game please email me at support@indgenious.com. Thanks for giving it a try anyways! :)

content: fun but hard
replyContent: Glad you had fun! If you have any ideas for improvements, please shoot me an email at support@indgenious.com.  Thanks for playing and thanks for your support! :)

content: AMAZINGLY THRILLING! I CANT FOR THE REST ... HOPEFULLY SOON TO BE CONTINUED
replyContent: I'd say it's more thriller than horror too, but wasn't able to work that into the title. ;P It will be some time before the sequel is out, but I'm working on updating the ending to provide a little more closure.  Best place to get updates is to follow one of my social media accounts.  Cheers, thanks for playing and for supporting my game! :)

content: I actually found a game that keeps my interest and that it's not boring thank you for the creation.
replyContent: You're very welcome, and thank you for playing and supporting my game!  Here's hoping it keeps you engaged til the very end! :)

content: Don't waste your money. I have plenty of storage space on my phone and a good connection but it still says it's unable to update. The game tries to update when you enter the elevator on the second level.
replyContent: Sorry the game is giving you trouble. I'm aware of this issue (it affects less than 1% of players) but haven't been able to figure out the problem. I'd appreciate if you could email me at support@indgenious.com so I can ask some questions about the issue. Just realized you're on the paid version I'll get you a full refund if you haven't already.

content: Bit dark in places, but overall a good experience. A little bit of abstract thinking on some of the puzzles, the hint system was good though. Did run into one bug on the 4 rings puzzle. The sound of the ring rotating started looping, had to close the game. Other than that, a pleasant experience, and I'm looking forward to the sequel/next installment.
replyContent: Thanks for the feedback, I'll look into the ring issue.  In the latest update I tried to address the abstract thinking and objects that were difficult to see.  If you don't mind emailing me at support@indgenious.com with more details I would appreciate it.  Thanks for playing! :)

content: Played it all in one go. Moving your character sometimes proves difficult. Know going in there is confusion involved, and enjoyed figuring it out. The game is very forgiving to those who may not be the best with puzzles and just want the story. The game is more atmospheric than anything; there are jump scares, but they are light. I was upset that completing the game reset my progress entirely; I hoped to revisit the story bits I collected after. Overall enjoyable horror game
replyContent: Thanks for the thoughtful review!  I'd love to discuss your experience further - can you email me at support@indgenious.com?  Cheers! :)

content: horror puzzle games no
replyContent: I hope you had fun! ;P Thanks for playing and please join me on social media to get notified of future releases! :)

content: Such a well thought out plot, kept my interest peaked the entire time. Some parts of the game were really tricky. It's hard to find games as good as this one.
replyContent: Thank you very much for the thoughtful review! I'm really glad you enjoyed the experience, I spent a lot of time crafting it. Please join me on social media to get notified of future releases! :)

content: Its a freaking awesome game, love it
replyContent: Right on!, glad you had fun!  Thanks for playing and please join me on social media to get notified of future releases! :)

content: My advice to anyone purchasing this game for a touch screen device is don't. There's a block puzzle that requires you to br exact in your placement but the actual mechanics of the puzzle make that impossible. It takes thirty times longer than it needs to because you spend the vast majority of your time trying to keep pieces you've already placed from knocking over. It completely ruined the game for me.
replyContent: Hi Melissa, the blocks puzzle is divisive - some hate it, others love it.  I'm not sure sure which of the three puzzles you're speaking to specifically, but if you are on the third and final puzzle (the rocket) then an option to skip the puzzle will appear 3 minutes after starting the puzzle.  Hope you can keep playing!! :)

content: Purchased full version. Played through the initial tutorial and started the full game. Several minutes into the game it said it needed to download an update. When it tried to update, it said it failed. Verified ample storage and good, quality connection, but nothing helped. Seemed like a decent game. Refunded.
replyContent: Hi Steven, very sorry the game is giving you trouble.  This issue pops up for 0.1% of users and I haven't been able to figure out why yet.  I am collecting data on this and would appreciate if you could email me at support@indgenious.com so I can ask a couple of questions.  Cheers.

content: Super fun game. I never buy games or apps but bought this & do not regret it. The graphics are 4/5, the storyline has some holes & in the end it was a bit much reading all the newspapers without enough of the storyline revealed. The puzzles are fantastic, some are simple, some are frustratingly complex, others seem easy but take some finesse(stacking the blocks). Great game, wish it was longer & had more scares-gore etc. The hints are perfect & can be played without purchase 90/100!!
replyContent: Hi Danielle, thanks for the thoughtful review!  The game originally had a lot more gore in it but the apps stores wouldn't accept it. I'd love to chat further about where you think the story can use work - please email me at support@indgenious.com if not too much trouble!  Cheers and thanks for your support! :)

content: Game is creepy and challenging. Have been playing for a couple of hours now and I'm so hooked.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your support, I'm glad you're enjoying the game!  Thanks for playing and please join me on social media if you would like future updates! :)

content: Great game
replyContent: Thank you very much for your support, I'm glad you enjoyed the game!  Thanks for playing and please join me on social media if you would like future updates! :)

content: This game scares me a lot and I jumped out of my skin multiple times. Jeez!
replyContent: I hope you won't have trouble sleeping! ;P  Thanks for playing!!

content: What can I say, this is one of the best point n click adventure games I have played in a long time. The graphics are immersive and pull you into the game and the music constantly maintains that sense of dread and foreboding. As a writer of horror, I almost felt like I was in one of my stories. I hope you create more games like this.
replyContent: Thanks very much! I spent a lot of time on the atmosphere and music and it's always nice to hear from folks who appreciate it!  Please join me on social media if you'd like updates.  Thanks for playing and supporting my game! :)

content: Great game! So glad there were hints though, I almost didn't hear the ticking for the timed game. That ending got me and I don't scare easy! Overall I'd recommend this game to any puzzle game nuts like myself. Can't wait to see what you create next!!
replyContent: Thanks very much for the kind words, I'm really happy you enjoyed the experience!  Please join me on social media if you'd like updates.  Thanks for playing and supporting my game! :)

content: Fun and challenging and nerve wracking and scary I love it
replyContent: So happy to hear those words, it's exactly what I wanted it to be!  Thanks for playing!! :)

content: I loved this game! It was challenging and fun
replyContent: Awesome, glad you liked it!  Thanks for playing and for taking the time to leave a review - they really help me out! :)

content: I love the graphics and the puzzles
replyContent: And they love you! ;P  Thanks for taking the time to leave review and thanks for playing!

content: I loved it 1000000% thank you soooo much 😍😘
replyContent: Oh wow, well you're very welcome!! Thank you for playing and for leaving such a nice review!! :)

content: Thanks for the reply! I've replied via email. Cheers!
replyContent: Hi Jamie, thanks for playing, supporting my game, and for the thoughtful review!  Interesting bit about the chrome box.. The game disables the 3rd block puzzle if it doesn't detect an accelerometer, I there is an accelerometer in your remote. After 3 min the puzzle will allow to skip, which should help you get past until I can patch the game. :)

content: This is one of the freakiest room escape game I have ever played. It is almost as freaky as the " Room" serie games. I absloutely love it. I also love that if you get stuck you get hints and even the solution if you truly cant figure out what to do. It was totally worth paying for, if you dont pay the ads make it really annoying to play the game. Buying it makes for a smoother game play and also doesnt interrupt you getting pulled more into the game as you progress. Hope you make more games !!
replyContent: Thanks Heidi!  Yes, ads really do ruin the experience - the game was never designed to be played with ads either.  Thanks for your support and kind words! I'm glad you enjoyed the experience!  Please join me on social media for future updates! :)

content: I was really enjoying the game until it said that I was either out of storage on my phone or had no internet connection. Neither was true. Help! I hope we can get it fixed, true fear is one of my fave games and this reminds me of it.
replyContent: Hi Melanie, sorry you've hit this snag! The message is generic and means that the game couldn't reach the download server. If you try again it should work. I'm always available at support@indgenious.com if you're still having issues! :)

content: I really enjoyed this game. The storyline is innovative and complex. The puzzles range from easy to hard and there are lots of hints and even skip options. The only downside to this game is that some items are difficult to see. It gets a little easier if you light up the screen, but it's still quite difficult to spot certain objects. Other than that, it's a great game and I really recommend it!
replyContent: Thanks for the review!! I'm taking down your feedback and may implement an in-game brightness control in future.  I appreciate the feedback and thanks for playing!  I'm glad you enjoyed the experience! :)

content: This is a very good puzzle horror game. I am a big fan of the True Fear games, and this game gives off a similar vibe. Some of the puzzles are not clear and when you go through the hints, you are still like, 'really, that's convoluted, and not in a suspenseful or interesting way.' The reason I gave the 3 star rating is because of the stupid timed run around book pulling puzzle. I play these games, because I like puzzles and a good scary story, not because I want to run around playing filler.
replyContent: Hi Jessica, thanks for leaving such a thoughtful review for my game! I tried to create a game that challenged both mind and dexterity but you're not alone in your feelings towards those books. I'd love to discuss more with you about the parts of the game you didn't enjoy - if it's not too much trouble, please email me at support@indgenious.com! :)

content: Worth buying! Great game, looking forward to more!
replyContent: Awesome!  Thanks for your purchase and for taking the time to leave a review - they help the game immensely!  Cheers! :)

content: Great game. Challenging, fun, and great jump scares! I've played a lot escape games (A LOT) and this ticked every box for me. Can't wait to see what this developer brings in the future! Awesome job!
replyContent: Wow, it means so much when I read something like this.  Thank you very much for taking a chance on my game and for leaving this epic review! Cheers. :)

content: Love this game. I sure wish there were more games like this on the play store.
replyContent: Thank you, sir, for your excellent review!  Please help spread the word! :)

content: GOT THE PREMIUM VERSION FOR FREE! For me, this is the first game in Google Play, whose developer replied to me immediately, within just 20-25 minutes! When I was playing the free version of this game, I faced some prombelmatic issues. As soon as, I reported this to the developer, I got an immediate response and he tried to fix the bug. But, when the error could not be eliminated, he just gave me the premium version for free! Now, I can enjoy this blood-curdling horror game with no glitches. 😀
replyContent: Glad everything is working now!!  If you have any other issues, just reach out to us at support@indgenious.com. Cheers! :)

content: Okay but not great. It wasn't bad but some puzzles (THE BLOCKS) required a steady hand vs just a sharp mind. I did enjoy that some solutions were there but not very obvious, as it added difficulty, but I just couldn't continue playing it and had to uninstall, as something about it gave me a headache. In hindsight, I should have tried the lite version before paying for this.
replyContent: Thanks for your response. We appreciate the feedback. If you could email us at support@indgenious.com, we'd like to discuss your experience with our game.

content: Fab game. I'm a fan of Birdcage escape series, house of da vinci, Room series etc. This game is fantastic. Well done to the developers 👍👍👍 please keep it up
replyContent: We are besides ourselves; you're placing us along side some of the best escape games out there! Not only are we are honoured, we are thrilled you enjoyed our game so much!!  Thanks for leaving a review (it really helps!), and please help spread the word!! :)

content: Great game. Story is compelling. Puzzles are easy to challenging.
replyContent: Thanks so much for the awesome review!  Please spread the word! :)

content: Really fun game to play! Puzzles are great!!
replyContent: Thanks for playing! Glad you like our game!

content: So basically I'm super intrigued. Amazing puzzle so far. Can't wait to figure this out. Awesome!!!!
replyContent: Thanks for playing!

content: Enjoyed this on my commute today. Made the time pass by fast. Looking forward to working through the levels.
replyContent: Thanks for playing!

content: Remember is a great horror puzzle adventure game with challenging puzzles and an intriguing story. The puzzles are quite varied and never repetitive, they also scale well in difficulty as you progress through the game. It has all the atmosphere and story to keep you interested and invested in the main character. As a fan of puzzle games, I can honestly say I thoroughly enjoyed this title and am looking forward to the other games this studio will be putting out.
replyContent: Thanks for playing! I think you may be the first to have beaten the game!

content: Very good, glad I took the chance on it.
replyContent: Thanks for playing!

content: Really like the sound effects. Enjoy the game so far.
replyContent: Glad you're enjoying the game! Thanks for playing!

content: Good, challenging puzzles. Story line that I want to continue to see what's going to happen.
